page.title: 18SURVEY 3 OCCUPATIONS
page.content:
TYPE OF OCCUPATION SAMPLE 55 Farmworker 8 Officeworker 20 Manual Work 14 Shop or Sales 11 Engineering 4 Professional 16 H M Forces 1 Retired 1 Full-time 54, Part-time 13, Seasonal 4
DISTANCE TRAVELLED TO WORK IN MILES Nil 4, 0-5mi 11, 5-10mi 7, 10-20mi 11 Over 20mi 11.
METHOD OF TRANSPORT TO WORK Car 52, Motorcycle 4, Bicycle 6, Walk7
LOCATION OF WORKPLACE Local 18, Cheltenham 9, Tewkesbury 2, Gloucester 8, Malvern 1, Newent 1, Ledbury 6, Cardiff 2, Hereford 2. Worcester 1, Birmingham 2, Southern England 1
